website_summaries.verdict: Great for thicker tables and comes with a bonus tray.
pros: total and fits tables up to 3.75" thick
Holds babies and toddlers up to 37 lbs
cons: The leg holes run small and the tray doesn't lock into place, so it's easy for a child to remove

customer_reviews.title: Phil ted v. Phil&ted amazon look up
customer_reviews.text: You probably need to discontinue this chair. It's not the same as the other one. The leg holes are much smaller than the other one. Phil ted lobster high chair. This one is phil&ted. My wife and I have a terrible time taking our son out. And after reading the one review about their kid choking...that's scary. I can't imagine that. But I understand how difficult it was to try to get him out. My sister order the one with bigger holes and I thought I had ordered the same one. Turns out I didn't. I just recommend you discontinue this "model". I will submit a picture of the differences once I meet up with my sister.
customer_reviews.author: P. Royle

customer_reviews.title: Used to be my fave chair for feeding and traveling ...
customer_reviews.text: Used to be my fave chair for feeding and traveling with, bought another and the new ones leg holes are so small I can’t get my baby (who isn’t even a year) out of it! Each time it’s a struggle and a screaming baby!
customer_reviews.author: HMS

customer_reviews.title: After baby, gift it to your cat.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. We don't have a kitchen table, just bar stools. Super useful until old enough to sit down at a toddler table with toddler chairs. We use it from time to time as a change of scenery, behaves better sitting down at the toddler table. It is now mostly the cat's napping hammock. I probably wouldn't have spent $90 on a cat sleeper... but glad to see at least one of the baby implements being used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair, I have another one that doesn't sit as close to the table so I appreciate that this one doesn't leave room for a baby to drop food. Only downside is the leg holes are pretty small. We have a skinnier baby 1 year old and it's hard to get her legs out sometimes...
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Huston

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I hate restaurant high chairs! They're never clean enough and they look uncomfortable. The phil&teds lobster chair is super easy to use and my little girl loves it. She's 6 months old and around 18 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve gone through FOUR other high chairs before trying this out and it’s easily our favorite. Minimal design that doesn’t take up a 3’ diameter of space, easy to clean, modern aesthetic but for us, doesn’t scream baby highchair. It does take a little more effort to get baby out of leg holes but worth it for the design aesthetic. I wish the straps came off since it’s so deep, there’s no need for them at all. We just tuck them down. Best baby gear!
customer_reviews.author: The Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and safe!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for at least a year and a half!!! My boy cant get out of it, its really sturdy and pretty much fits most tables. We also used it for international travel, since not all places provide highchairs! It not too heavy, it is sturdy and my boy is 20 months old, we still use it everytime! They do look comfy as well. The cons, you cant wash them in the washing machine :( i soaked mine in soapy water, scrub the yucky parts a little, and rinsed under clean water.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love the design... too bad it doesn’t work with many tables
customer_reviews.text: The design is very good and construction solid. Unfortunately you need a table with NO BRACING (ie totally flat on the underside) and one with at least 3 legs and preferably 4. It is nearly impossible to find tables like this when eating out. We used to carry the chair everywhere only to be disappointed 90% of the time because the tables were not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Brett C

customer_reviews.title: my little guy likes to suck on the round metal part and get food all ...
customer_reviews.text: very handy and doesn't take up much space. not the easiest chair to get my little guy in and out of, but that is a trade off I am willing to make because I didn't want a giant high chair. It is possible to disassemble and clean, but it takes some work. my little guy likes to suck on the round metal part and get food all over the fabric around the chair so it does get pretty grungy. we wipe it down after each use and take it apart to wash it thoroughly every week
customer_reviews.author: Laura Rideout

customer_reviews.title: Optimal for less space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and is a great option to have if you are short on space! It’s comfortable and well built. Very hard to clean. So if your child throws up you can put this in the washer. Have to manually clean it and that can get tricky! Also always need a solid platform like a counter top or sturdy table to install it. Won’t work on most wooden or normal tables in restaurants etc! Over time after 2 years of use the seat tore from the sides and we had to discard it because there was no way of fixing the torn fabric!
customer_reviews.author: shrutikapoor

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy this and how it takes up little to no space! taking it apart is easy for clean up- once every couple of days I turn it inside and and throw it into the washer to let it air dry. My only complaint is for the tray. The tray doesn't stay in place, and if I 'm putting it in wrong, there were no instructions that made that part clear.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Garcia

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8 month old and lately going out to eat has been a nightmare. He doesn’t want to stay in his car seat, tries to tip over the restaurant supplied wooden high chairs, and squirms out of your lap. All the while grabbing everything he can off the table. We just received our lobster chair and have used it twice, and OH MY GOD- we can eat out again!! He loves it. He sits peacefully right next to me, with his toys and snacks on the tray. I cannot say enough about this product, worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold, lightweight, easy to pack into carrying case
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best product I have bought for my child. I seen a girl with her two year old in it at a restaurant and she highly recommended it. I was still pregnant at the time. He is one now and I’ve now purchased two to keep in my vehicle and my husbands vehicle. We use it every time we go out to eat. I have friends who purchased something similar to this but it didn’t fold up as easy nor was it as compact as this one. I tell everyone about it and highly recommend it! You won’t find anything better than this highchair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS THING!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this for a trip, but it quickly became our everyday highchair and we ditched the old stand-alone one we had. This takes up no floor space and is super sturdy. It’s lightweight, breathable and is easy to attach and remove. Only cons are that the mesh is a little hard to get the food out of sometimes and it doesn’t work on tables with beveled edges or lips like some other clamp-on chairs. Our little is 9 months now and we are already a little concerned with the small leg space. Sometimes her chubby thighs get stuck and we have to pull the chair down off of them. Hopefully they don’t outgrow it because we love this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Muench

customer_reviews.title: In lieu of a typical high chair
customer_reviews.text: We have used this with our baby since she was big enough to sit (now 1yr) instead of a typical high chair. We attach it to our bar or table and that's where she eats all her meals. It's easy to put up and take down, feels very sturdy and safe. I'm not sure the best way to clean it though. I use a shop vac to suck out all the food and when things get real messy I've hosed it off outside and let it air dry. We took it to restaurants with us a few times as well but it doesn't fit on all tables. The carrying bag makes it very easy to take on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Jorie

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling (restaurants, hotels, etc.)
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fantastic if you are traveling with your child (probably under 2 years old), particularly when in a hotel/airbnb/restaurant. The chair is easy to set up on most tables or kitchen bar, is sturdy, fits in a large diaper bag, and is easy to clean. I do agree that the tray is useless, and it's hard to get a kid out of it, but thing weighs next to nothing and makes life infinitely easier for traveling parents. It's also good for a nannyshare if the host family doesn't want to have two huge highchairs in their dining room or kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PGH

customer_reviews.title: great for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for uses grandparents, because we don't have room to store a highchair. Also great for restaurants... but be sure you have the right table or counter overhang - it DOES NOT fit on every table.
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: What a great and sturdy high chair!
customer_reviews.text: We love everything about this “high chair”! We were a bit hesitant at first to clamp a high chair onto our dining table with our baby in it. When we received the product I didn’t the realize the clamp was made of plastic but it’s the toughest plastic there is. We have our 30 lb baby sitting in it for breakfast, lunch, and dinner! It is perfect for a small space. Although a little tight on his chunky thighs, he seems to like sitting in it. The tray is a plus for easy clean-up! I definitely recommend this if your looking for a space saver high chair.
customer_reviews.author: MDee

customer_reviews.title: Tray needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Ughhhhh the tray is a huge design flaw for us. It doesn’t clip into the chair at all so toddler just pushes it away whenever she feels like it. For $90 I really thought we’d have a tray that didn’t cause frustration at dinner time. And it means we likely won’t be able to use the tray at a restaurant which is a total bummer. The steel is nice and we are able to use it on a table with a lip. But we didn’t seem to get the chest clasp harness in our seat? We just have shoulder straps but they don’t click together. It folds really compact which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyashleyashley

customer_reviews.title: This chair has been so nice to have when we go out to restaurants that ...
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent. One of the top 5 Baby things I’ve purchased so far! This chair has been so nice to have when we go out to restaurants that don’t have high chairs or the ones that they do have are dirty, broken or in the way. It’s even been handy at family get togethers and friends houses! This would make an amazing baby registry gift for someone!
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made and convenient with a removable tray
customer_reviews.text: 3 star for me. Very nicely made and convenient with a removable tray. However I don't think I read the reviews enough to realize it would not work for our dining room table. The clamps have to have at least 2 inches to be screwed onto, our table has wood that comes down after an inch, deeming this unsafe for us.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! Bought for my second child & wish I had it for my first. We use it at home & on the go. Easy to take with you in the carrying bag, wipes clean, can use the accompanying tray or just the tabletop. Very sturdy & durable & easy enough to use that the grandparents can do it. Worth every penny!!! Plus it’s not touching the floor so it’s one less thing to clean around.
customer_reviews.author: AHelton

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat! It is so handy when eating out and gives us piece of mind knowing our daughter isn’t sitting in some dirty seat (germaphobe here). We also like the fact that we can sit in booths and not have her sitting in the walkway; she can sit in the inside of the booth away from people walking by. The only reason for one less star is the difficulty getting her out of the seat. When sitting in the seat, her thighs have plenty of room; however, when we go to take her out, her thighs get stuck and if she isn’t cooperating, it can be a struggle to get her out.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Best traveling highchair
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy we bought this highchair! Our main reason was for traveling. It is so compact and easy to secure to the table. We also use it a lot when we go out to eat. She is always at the right height with this highchair and I don't have to deal with dirty restaurant highchairs. We always receive compliments on it too! Once I let my daughter eat avocado and yogurt in this chair. Afterwards, I felt like this was a huge mistake because she made such a mess. I was so surprised how easy it was to clean the chair. Everything wiped off easily with a wet rag.
customer_reviews.author: Denea Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've made for my son! It's so easy to use at restaurants. I love how compact it folds and that it comes with a carrying case, too. The case is just big enough to also fit the Baby Bjorn bib perfectly. I also love that it comes with its' own tray so I know my son is eating off a clean surface. We keep it in the car for restaurant trips and when visiting family.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika G.

customer_reviews.title: Portable, space saver and just awesome
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! Takes up a fraction of he space and still doing great at 22 months and 31 lbs. The stitching on the removable piece has frayed a little and part of the cushioning part that bites down on the table dissapeared but this chair is portable and fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hannon

customer_reviews.title: Baby travel must-have!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Lobster! It feels so secure on our counter and any table we have tried it on. The fact that it’s so easily portable and comes with its own bag makes this a travel must-have. I also love that I can either use the tray or leave it out and just use the table top as the eating surface.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to clip on and off - stores very flat
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to attach to tables, as long as they have a standard flat edge. Super sturdy even for my wriggly baby - the harness keeps her in tight. Attaches and removes in seconds and folds super flat for easy transport. I keep one under the seat in my car for outings. The tray can be easily removed by baby, but so can dishes and suction bowls, so I still use it as a barrier on top of the restaurant table. Highly recommend for traveling, picnics, to keep as an extra for visitors.
customer_reviews.author: JHMV

customer_reviews.title: Really Sturdy, leg hole size is fine!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how sturdy this clip chair is! It has some weight to it and clamps down very well to our island. I saw some complaints about leg hole size but the leg holes seem plenty large and roomy for an average size baby.
customer_reviews.author: EBaum

customer_reviews.title: Great High Chair, unfortunately until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this high chair about a year ago for our son. It's great. Easy to use. Easy to wipe down. I haven't ever taken it apart to clean it. About a month ago I noticed that it was ripping. My son is about 25lbs, so well below the weight limit. The entire bottom seam has ripped away from the chair, so it's unusable. We will have to get another one, but likely will not rebuy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this high chair :) ! We have used it many time at many different places they all worked perfectly. Our little man was born at 1lb 13oz he has a low immune system and I hate to use store high chairs! I love how this one has a little tray and is so small and portable! The only thing I don't like about high chairs that cling to the table is I'm scared he will fall but this one fits in a booth :) witch also means no waiters can drop stuff on him !!!
customer_reviews.author: Verhey

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I wanna love this thing but 2 major fails....The carrying case came ripped and I can't find a way to contact the seller for a replacement. Also tray doesn't slide into a fixed position, baby removes it very easily and will probably make a huge mess once foods on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this lobster high chair. Our little one has been using it since she was about 8 months old and it allows us to go out as a family which is wonderful. My only complaint is I don't love how the tray works. The connection and stability feels a little insecure.
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quick to set up. Secure and sturdy. Only complaints are that my 10 month-old's super chubby thighs seems to get stuck in the leg openings so it's challenging to remove him out of the seat and also he sits a bit low in the seat making it a little hard for him to reach the table/tray to self feed.
customer_reviews.author: Grace P.

customer_reviews.title: ... daily for a few months Light weight Very secure Easy clean up Fits 95% of restaurant tables Comfortable Fits ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this thing 10 stars I would Been using it almost daily for a few months Light weight Very secure Easy clean up Fits 95% of restaurant tables Comfortable Fits in its storage bag, we have all had those items that don't Lots of compliments from total strangers Cleaner than restaurant high chairs Don't have to worry about people knocking her over Can fit this chair and 4 people at a 4 person table, very compact
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quick to setup and put away
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! We started using this when our kid was 4 months old. She loves sitting at the table with everyone. It is so easy to use. Highly recommend over all other brands. We tried the Inglesina brand and it was much harder to setup and put back in the bag once finished.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Arensberg

customer_reviews.title: Well made seat, but hard to clean and not good for chubby babies
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good compact seat, but it’s not great if your baby is chubby so it wasn’t good for us. Hard to get our little one in and out and he’s always too close to the table. It’s not the easiest thing to clean either.
customer_reviews.author: Massiel Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: We. Love. This. Chair. If you know someone who is having or has newish baby, buy them one. Hell buy them two. One for the car, one for home. This is absolutely the most convenient way for baby to join you at any table. There hasn't been a single time where we couldn't attach this. Highly, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing! Perfect for restaurants
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Perfect for restaurants. Tons of questions and requests to know what it is. I’ve probably referred 20+ people by now. I also use it on kitchen island. Baby loves it in there, comfortable. Space efficient. Easy to screw on/off. Good quality. Easy to fold/transport. Can hook to any height table we’ve encountered so far.
customer_reviews.author: DGraham

customer_reviews.title: Great chair. Horrible tray.
customer_reviews.text: This chair was great all except for the tray. It said it was dishwasher safe but after putting it in one time it had shrunk. It no longer fits on the chair at all, and the baby just takes it off repeatedly. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: John D Davidhizar Jr

customer_reviews.title: Only thing I dont like is when you bring the baby out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dont like is when you bring the baby out of the seat you need someone to pull the seat down because their legs get stuck in the fabric. I wish the tabs to hold the tray in place were longer to clamp in the table clamps. My daughter was able to push it out of place at 8 months old. Other than that is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: AMCer

customer_reviews.title: best purchase
customer_reviews.text: one of the best purchases i made for my child. it keeps them contained and while at a restaurant its what you want! clips to the majority of tables, but just be careful on the weight of your child bc it could tip the table. I just wish the cloth would come off to wash it in the machine, because spot cleaning doesn't really work on stuck on food..
customer_reviews.author: MJMS

customer_reviews.title: We live in an apartment with minimal space so when ...
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment with minimal space so when our baby needed a high chair this suited our needs. Securely attaches to our dining table. We have brought it out to restaurants too and it works well. Minus one star because it’s sometimes hard to get baby out of it because his legs get stuck in the leg openings. And he’s not even that big of a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: Great chair.  Have used it for six months now and don't plan to stop anytime soon.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair! At first it was a little deep for my six month old. We would just fold a towel and place in the seat for her to sit on to raise her a bit. We didn't have to do that for long. We attach it to our granite counter top. Very easy to take on the go for dining out. It's folds up and fits into a small carrying bag. The tray will fit in the bag also. It will not work if the table has an apron. We've only run into that issue once or twice while dining out. Most places we go it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great Highchair
customer_reviews.text: We love this highchair! We use it at home and at restaurants. Setting it up is quick and easy as is taking it down. The only thing that could be improved is the tray that comes with the highchair does not click or lock into place. Our baby boy is always sliding it out and it ends up everywhere but on the table, so we just stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Easy/Compact but Be Careful with Teething Babies
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to move/readjust. Baby kind of slouches in it after a while, due to no footrest. Watch out for teething babes, as mine chipped her tooth biting on the metal lining for .2 seconds before stopping her. Hopefully a newer model will have that lining silicone-coated.
customer_reviews.author: RiehlDeal19

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for travel and occasional use
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of a similar style highchair we have. The other one is more outdoors and has a very different screw on/clamp system. This one is much simpler and feels just as sturdy. We use it occasionally when going to restaurants. The tray that comes with it does slide somewhat under the arms, but is not super secured. That said, it serves well for providing some fruit or puffs. The item itself folds in a small bag three inches or so thick and roughly a foot long when folded. That allows it to be brought to a restaurant in our fairly well sized diaper and toy bag.
customer_reviews.author: Steven G.Top Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: The tray is easily washable. My only complaint is that it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this regularly when dining with our toddler. We've received tons of interest and compliments. I think this works especially well for children who are still too small for the restaurant high chairs, and don't have that as an option. The tray is easily washable. My only complaint is that it seems the tray does not attach to the chair, rather it slides underneath the arms. This allows the child to pull/lift on the tray, and eventually detach it. Still, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Bear Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great, buttt...
customer_reviews.text: This a great looking chair, plus such a great space saver in our apartment. The reason for the 4 stars vs. 5 is (as mentioned in other reviews) the leg openings are definitely on the small side. My soon to be 2 yr old is petite so her legs go in out just fine but if she is wearing bulky shoes, forget it! So annoying! I usually put her in without shoes. Could be a deal breaker with people who have chubby lo's!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: We love the look (black, not an obnoxious "baby" item) in our house and since about 13 months its the only place our daughter eats her meals. Bye bye high chair, hello more floor space! Great to travel with too, and even take to restaurants who don't have highchairs. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: 🖒
customer_reviews.text: this is one of my favorite baby products. I love that there is no gap from the seat to the table like most chairs. it's so compact. we use it weekly, and it's holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Balddog

customer_reviews.title: Lobster chairs are awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best thing I had as a new mom. We brought this chair all over the Caribbean and Europe. When my son was smaller, I didn't want him in the wooden chairs at restaurants because they were too big and he wasn't too coordinated with sitting up and this was a perfect option. When he got a bit older, I didn't want him in germy chairs because he put his hands in his mouth constantly. And some places just don't have highchairs! I buy them for all my preggo friends now. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: JCMA

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and incredibly useful
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this high chair. I get compliments every where I go. People are so curious and say they have never seen anything like it. The only complaint is I can't get the tray to stay in place properly so I rarely use it. The chair is awesome and so very convenient. It is worth every penny and I am very happy I purchased it. Originally it was specifically for some trips out of the country, but it is very convenient to take to people's homes who may not have a high chair, restaurants to avoid using their dirty chairs, or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair that is very easy to use and has incredible clamping force making it very stable. Great for restaurants because you can put it at the end or over the seat of a booth. Only drawback is you can not use it if the table or counter has a lip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tangelovette

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: None of the high chairs at restaurants seem to work right. This is the perfect solution. It’s light weight and sets up in seconds. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: ... I was ordering the same chair my friends all recommended, but they have changed the measurements
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering the same chair my friends all recommended, but they have changed the measurements! The leg holes are to small now and it isn't quite the same as the older model. Not sure why they changed it. He will grow out of it too fast and I'm really bummed I didn't save the box or I would return. What a waste of money😕
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Galland

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Gift Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best gifts ever for a baby. All mothers love them because they do not have to use public chairs or when visiting friends or relatives who don't have a high chair, it works perfectly on a table. The baby is secure. The tray is removable and cleanable. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D. Haraway

customer_reviews.title: The high chair is awesome, but I have to fill up my kitchen ...
customer_reviews.text: How did I not notice that you can't take this apart to clean it? The high chair is awesome, but I have to fill up my kitchen sink and soak it to get food off the canvas. We've barely begun using it at 6 months, and it got pretty disgusting after a week. Would not buy again and will replace it with one that has a machine washable seat.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Super useful, best option for taking your little ones ...
customer_reviews.text: Super useful, best option for taking your little ones to the restaurant. Way more secure and clean then a high-chair, very easy to transport because it folds completely and comes with a little bag to store it. Just leave it in your car and take it with you to the restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but....
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this portable high chair, but unfortunately, we haven't been able to use it very often. The high chair is only meant to be used on basic square or rectangular tables, without a lip, etc. This has made it quite limiting for us when dining out. Luckily, most restaurants have high chairs, so it hasn't sent us home from anywhere, but I wish it could be used on more tables.
customer_reviews.author: rnrgrl76

customer_reviews.title: These are great, we have twins and limited kitchen and dining ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great, we have twins and limited kitchen and dining space. These are exactly what we were looking for. We also love that they can go with us anywhere, they love sitting at the table with us in restaurants and are not limited to the very end with a highchair. The trays are super easy to clean up and the seats as well just wipe them down.
customer_reviews.author: mom2twins

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love the lime green color, but unfortunately, you can't take the upholstery off to wash, and the chair is rather heavy. The removable plastic tray is so flimsy, my grandaughter was pushing it off and making a mess. The tray doesn't click it or stay snug, so my daughter says take it off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Inouye

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite items
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite baby purchases. My baby started using it when he was 6 months old and it's amazing. I prefer this so much more to a high chair, as does baby. It's basically with me all the time and is used multiple times a week. It clips on to pretty much any table. Even round ones. It says you shouldn't use it with a table with a lip, but i've done it and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Briarwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this chair to 2 different new moms at baby showers. The first Mom’s child has been using it since the baby could sit up...she says it’s the best gift she’s ever received! The 2nd one was for a newly born baby so, it will be awhile until it can be used.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F. Gladfelter

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for parents! Our son used his from age 4 months through 2 years. We recently bought a second one for our twins. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Grissom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Better than a traditional high chair because of the space it saves. Easier to clean as well. Simply unscrew it and pop it in the laundry. Your table must have an overhang of at least 4 inches for the clamps to work. Tight, secure and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but a couple complaints
customer_reviews.text: This chair is fairly compact and easy to use. No assembly required. The only two complaints we have are a lot of tables at restaurants don't have four posts, but one in the middle, which this product doesn't seem very safe on. Also, the tray comes undone really easily and my 10 month old loves to rip it off. This chair is fairly snug for our 20 lb baby but it still works fine for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for an older baby, perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, but it is definitely for a bigger kid. My son is 6 months, weighs 17 pounds, and he is in the 95th percentile for height. He really sinks down in the chair, so only his little head is above the tray. That said, we took the chair on vacation with us and it folds nicely and we found it very transportable. I hope to use it more as he gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: This lasted less than 6 months before the fabric ripped ...
customer_reviews.text: This lasted less than 6 months before the fabric ripped at the side... and this was the second one we purchased, after the rubber grips came off the first one. We won't be buying a third.
customer_reviews.author: JT1

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this and so do I
customer_reviews.text: This has been the Best Buy for a travel high chair. It is so easy to use and baby is always at table height. Very durable and stable.
customer_reviews.author: ashley madewell

customer_reviews.title: Compact/easy to clean for mommy, comfortable for LO
customer_reviews.text: The seller delivers within a day using Prime. Both I and my little one like the product. It's comfortable and convenient. The best part is it's very easy to clean. I have a messy eater, so it's an very important plus for me! It's very compact, although a bit heavy to carry around in the backpack while traveling, but it is the trade off for a sturdy design. Would recommend it to others. We couldn't use it as often as we would like to during the holiday because many tables have a "skirt." However, we already know this could be the problem, and don't mind that much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kunde

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was worth every.single.penny! This chair is not only great for travel, but so convenient for just going out for meals as well. The tray will not stay in place and is pretty much worthless, which is one of two complaints. The second is it does not work on all tables. If there is a lip or only a center support on a table, use with this chair is iffy. Even with these two issues, I would still purchased it 10 times over!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite baby purchases!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so great! It has a little travel bag and I bring it with me everywhere. I pack it in my suitcase for visits with friends and family and my son can always be part of the action when we sit around the table. It doesn't work with all tables since it needs a large enough ledge to clamp on, but I use it on my table and my counter. My 6 month old son loves it and so did my 2 year old niece. It is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Rachellg

customer_reviews.title: Space saving
customer_reviews.text: I love that this chair takes minimal space as I have babies that are 14 months apart and a small kitchen. Although I haven’t taken it anywhere yet I can’t wait to use it while we travel instead of using those dirty restaurant ones!
customer_reviews.author: Onelovedove

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to throw in washer, very sturdy, tray is worthless, just toss it, still love this chair though! we own two, one for home and one for camping and outdoor use on picnic tables. We dont use at restaurants because I pack enough crap around, do not want to be carrying this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Johnson-Gould

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I'd do without it!
customer_reviews.text: After using one of these at a restaurant I ordered one for myself that night. These high chairs are the best thing I've ever bought. The fold down so small and flat and can be stored anywhere. And how the clamps work they can be put on any table no matter what size or shape. I've had it on really thick circular tables and it still worked perfectly! Everywhere I go people stop me and ask me who makes it and are amazed by it. I give recommendations for it almost every day. Do yourself a huge favor and get one. It makes going out to eat with a baby so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Tarter

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who is 5 months old. He loves it. easy to attach, very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Urban Spaces
customer_reviews.text: This high chairs is exactly what I needed. I live in the city so I don't; have space for a traditional high chair. The Phil & Teds chair attaches securely to the counter/bar in my kitchen. I dine out and travel so I like that this unit is portable because some of the restaurants I patronize do not have high chairs.
customer_reviews.author: EBS982

customer_reviews.title: Great travel chair if it works
customer_reviews.text: This product is great and our baby loves it. People often ask where we got it. Easy to transport and setup. My only issue is that it doesnt work on a lot of tables. The table cant have a lip at the end of it or there isn't space to attach the claws.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Extremely convenient. Easier to install than the Inglesina. ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely convenient. Easier to install than the Inglesina. Only works if there is no obstacles underneath your table. We still use our Inglesina exclusively on a table that does not allow close latching. Make sure to check on that before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: ChristopherBJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this chair!!!! It is small and can go anywhere with us. It frees up our chairs at home around our table for guests and our daughter can be at the table too. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small leg holes
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a 5 point harness...but the leg holes are extremely small. My son's legs (1 year old - 75th percentile for height/weight) got stuck every time we pulled him out of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. Used it once so far. Does not fit safely on all tables.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl O'Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Very study
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Very study. It is somewhat hard to get by child's legs out as they tend to get 'stuck' in the leg holes. Those could probably be a bit bigger. Overall, not a big problem and would still recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for restaurant outings when you don't want your baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for restaurant outings when you don't want your baby eating off high chairs that have never been cleaned. Folds up and stores in its little carry bag perfectly, taking up very little space. Once secured, it will stay in place and grips surfaces strongly. Lightweight to carry as well. Most importantly my 7 month old just loves to sit in it and play with his toys while swinging his legs.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Leonard

customer_reviews.title: This seat clips on great to the table
customer_reviews.text: This seat clips on great to the table, and I like the idea of the tray you can wash but the tray doesn’t stay put at all and the leg holes are SO small that my kiddo actually hates sitting in it for more than a few minutes because it digs into her thighs. So upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: CLBosco

customer_reviews.title: This is Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if we have purchased any single item for our baby that has received more use, and/or produced more fun times. We sit and eat while listening to music multiple times everyday - and our little guy is in this chair with us doing his thing. We are fortunate to have a counter top island eating area that suits the lobster chair perfectly...flat on top and flat underneath, about 2 inches thick (also a relatively straight edge to the counter). I would imagine there are scenarios where the chair will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Slimbo

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product! We take it everywhere we go and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! We take it everywhere we go and just attach the seat to any table.
customer_reviews.author: kandy0215

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Purchase Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby 'gadget' I have ever purchased. We use it everywhere we go, it's amazing. Keeps the kid snug (they move around so much in high chairs, always trying to climb out) and confined to a safe chair during meals. Can fit very large or slim tables, very versatile in that regard. Great for travel with its own bag. The clear table doesn't always fit snug (my child rips it up), but the chair itself is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than a prior model.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than the prior version and hard to get my toddler out of it. Love the convenience and sturdiness but the keg hikes need to be wider.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: The only drawbacks are that it is pretty hard to clean because it doesn't come apart and ...
customer_reviews.text: The only drawbacks are that it is pretty hard to clean because it doesn't come apart and it can't clamp to a table that has a vertical piece of trim around the edges. It's perfect for a counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Craig J. Pietrowiak

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to clean. It doesn't just wipe clean like they say. It is mesh inside which is very hard to get food out of.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Zvaifler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Way better than the high chairs at restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: portable, easy to attach, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to take to restaurants, friends houses, etc. Easy to fit on nearly every table and folds up flat. the clamps look small but the chair is really strong and sturdy. Not problem at all even for big, strong, active baby!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Returned item because it did not seem very easy to carry around if the primary purpose was for ...
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier than I expected it to be. Returned item because it did not seem very easy to carry around if the primary purpose was for going out or travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty small. The clamps seem to hold it to ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty small. The clamps seem to hold it to the table very tight, but they don't seem to hold the tray down so baby can grab it and spill her food all over. Maybe I don't have it installed right...? It's easy to take on the go for picnics or places without highchairs to borrow.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great travel and restaurant seat for babies and toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Great travel and restaurant seat for babies and toddlers. We get compliments every time we bring it out. Not the easiest to clean but still a great a seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stephon

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient to take around to different places
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient to take around to different places. Very compact compared to other brands/models and can fit in a baby bag or stroller. I also love the small tray that it comes with and have received many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair!! VERY secure and my son enjoys watching us cook and bustle around the kitchen while he eats his early dinner. I feel 100% confident in the safety of this item. Tray is a bit weird and I have never been able to keep it secure between front clamp on arms, but he just eats off of the granite or his plate.
customer_reviews.author: LCKatt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for a baby shower for twins. The parents were very pleases with the construction and color.
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

product_meta.title: phil&teds Lobster Clip-On Highchair, Black – Award Winning Portable High Chair – Includes Carry Bag and Dishwasher Safe Tray – Hygienic and Easy Clean – Safe and Secure – Ideal For Home and Travel
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Size:Single

Adaptable dining in an ultra portable high chair

Have lobster at the table every day! An award winning travel high chair, lobster flat packs into its own compact carry bag, measuring just 14" x 13" x 3" (Folded dimension in bag 13.7 inches x 13.4 inches x 3 inches) . Clip lobster on to almost any table or bench top at home or on your travel adventure, and keep your baby clean, safe and part of the family sitting right up at the table!

 Genie of hygiene

No need to use those grubby restaurant high chairs!

 Lobster is super easy to take with you when dining out with your baby. Granting all your cleaning wishes, the lobster fabric is durable & wipe clean, and slides right off the high chair frame for hand washing. A dishwasher-safe food tray slides between the clamps to protect your table surface from food spills. Hygien-ius!

 Claw strength - ultra safe & secure

 A 4-point safety harness with padded shoulder straps keeps the wriggliest of babies safe & secure in their high chair. Super strong ‘lobster claws’ with rubber grips secure to the table using a ‘twist on-and-off’ clamp mechanism - easy for adults, not so easy for kids.

 Ready, set, eat! Super fast set up

 Pick lobster up by the frame, and it literally falls into position, ready to attach to your table. When you’re ready to pack down again, just flip the clamps inward and lobster will fold neatly back onto itself, ready to slide into it’s own carry bag. And you’re off!

 Smart & stylish - get a taste of lobster!

 The satin finish aluminium frame and robust, easy care fabrics are not only strong & durable, but so stylish you’ll be turning heads at every table you clip on to! The deep, padded seat provides all the comfort and postural support your baby needs to nosh and get growing - this is one smart cookie.

 Not suitable for use on glass top tables, tables with loose table tops, table leaves, single pedestal tables, card tables, camping tables, or tables with rounded or beveled edges or lips
feature_bullets: SUPER LIGHT & COMPACT - Aluminum frame with padded back support and a shoulder harness system weighing in under 4 pounds
ADAPTABLE - Robust aluminum clamps with non slip grip pads fit tables from 0.8" up to 3.75" thick and suitable for indoor and outdoor use
SAFE & SECURE - Globally safety certified design can accommodate a child 3 months to 3 years up to a max weight of 37 pounds
HYGIENIC - Includes a dishwasher safe tray and travel bag that fits easily into diaper bags, purses, and stroller gear baskets
STYLISH - so stylish you’ll be turning heads at every table you clip on to!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars804 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
